description:
The seventh-generation Prologo Jersey still holds to its origins. It feels like an instant classic, with performance that's distinctly modern. Brand new fabric offers outstanding moisture management and sun protection, with a collar construction that protects shelters your neck.

  • Soft micro-piqué body fabric wicks sweat and has UPF 50 sun protection
  • Velocity Rev2 summerweight sleeves have UPF 30 sun protection
  • Full-length YKK zipper to self-regulate your venting
  • 3 rear drop-in pockets
  • Silicone waist elastic and dropped tail helps keep your jersey in place
  • Reflective piping is subtle until you need it to be visible
name: Castelli Prologo 7 Long Sleeve Jersey - Men's
